name: An Adventurer's Last Stand
description:
“Hello? Is anyone there?”

Two adventurers stand confused in the village of Talibot with their other party members gone without a trace. They had never been alone on a quest before. Usually, there were other people that did all of the hard work…

But perhaps this could be their first moment! Yes, they will be known as courageous heroes back home. Fables and legends are only a few minutes away!

Or hours.

Or days.

“...where are we, anyways?”

Wrest control of a sword-wielding warrior or magic-harnessing mage in a first-person RPG survival game as you fight off the straggling mobs of monsters in the hopes that your party comes back to rescue your sorry butt. Take your last stand, and survive as long as you can! The tales written in your name are counting on it…
